Version 0.8 (2011-09-06)
    Added supports for more than one custom order
    
Version 0.7 (2011-09-06)
    Renamed "suggestor" in "stage_whisper"
    Added more comments to the code
    Added readme file on github
    Edited the content_wrapper function

Version 0.7 (2011-09-05)
    Rewrited the mcp file.
    Added new wrapper for the views files.
    Added new function "suggestor" to have a list of entries in the entry order form.
    

Versio 0.5  (2011-08-12)
    Initial release.
